title: Help defend Earth from asteroids with your Unistellar telescope
description: Unistellar co-founder tells Space.com about how citizen scientists are using smart telescopes to engage in planetary defense.
content: Unistellar co-founder tells Space.com about how citizen scientists are using smart telescopes to engage in planetary defense.
